name: Snake Oil - A Salesman's Quest
description:
*For better experience please download the game to your PC*

Welcome to the world of Snake Oil! 

Your mission is: sell a supposed miracle drug at any cost to as many people as possible, even if it can kill anyone who consumes it. You must go through the whole scenario using your salesman's language, choosing the right answers for each person and thus convincing them to buy your product.

What matters is to sell at any cost to anyone. Be the best seller in the world in this Top Down and Visual Novel style game.

Commands:

WASD - Move the character

Mouse Button - Choose the options in the game

E - Interact with NPC
